constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 19 (Tuesday, February 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. STEIL:
H.R. 733.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of the United Sates
Constitution, ``To regulate commerce with foreign nations,
and among the several states, and with the Indian tribes''
[Page H280]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Stop Evasion of Iran Sanctions Act of 2021
